name: EC2MountPointPropertyType
description: The EC2 MountPoint property is an embedded property of the AWS::EC2::Instance type.

properties.name: Device
properties.description: How the device is exposed to the instance (such as /dev/sdh, or xvdh).

properties.name: VolumeId
properties.description: The ID of the Amazon EBS volume. The volume and instance must be within the same Availability Zone and the instance must be running.
